text:
His eyes widened at your nonchalant gesture. That brush was expensive. He knew from how soft and sturdy it looked. The girl by his side gasped and his crowd went silent. His face went red as rage filled him. He let go of his girlfriend and pushed you
"Are you crazy? You threw out that brush! Do you know how much that costs!? Why would you do that!?"
trans:
Ses yeux s’écarquillèrent face à ton geste désinvolte. Ce pinceau était cher. Il le savait rien qu’à son apparence douce et robuste. La fille à ses côtés poussa un cri de surprise et sa bande se tut. Son visage devint rouge tandis que la rage l’envahissait. Il lâcha sa petite amie et te poussa.
« Ça ne va pas, non ?! Tu as jeté ce pinceau ! Tu sais combien ça coûte !? Pourquoi tu as fait ça !? »
